lock_ref.description: RIS_ID of the Lock object the Lock basin is belonging to.

lock_type.description: This attribute indicates the type of the lock basin. Allowed values: lokbsn (lock basin), loklft (lock lift)

max_length_cm.description: Maximum allowed length of the vessel in cm. This shall be a fall-back default value for all ship categories, if no Sailing Dimensions table is provided.

max_width_cm.description: Maximum allowed width of the vessel in cm. This shall be a fall-back default value for all ship categories, if no Sailing Dimensions table is provided.

max_draught_cm.description: Maximum allowed draught of the vessel in cm. This shall be a fall-back default value for all ship categories, if no Sailing Dimensions table is provided.

max_height_cm.description: Maximum allowed height of the vessel in cm. This shall be a fall-back default value for all ship categories, if no Sailing Dimensions table is provided.

cl_width_cm.description: Available width of the lock basin in cm.

cl_length_cm.description: Available length of the lock basin in cm.

pass_duration_minute.description: Average passage duration of the lock in minutes.

supplies.description: Comma separated list of available supplies (codes). Allowed values: 1 (drinking water), 2 (electrical power), 3 (fuel), 4 (put car ashore), 5 (bilge water disposal),  6 (paper waste disposal), 7 (plastic waste disposal), 8 (glass waste disposal), 9 (residual waste disposal), 10 (oil waste disposal), 11 (organic waste disposal), 12 (dangerous waste disposal), 13 (sewage water disposal).

position.description: Position of the lock basin in the lock complex. Allowed values: LE (Left), MI (Middle), RI (Right), N (North), NE (North-east), E (East), SE (South-east), S (South), SW (South-west), W (West), NW (North-west), BI (Big), SM (Small), OL (Old), EW (New)

operation_mode.description: Specifies in which operational mode a lock basin may be passed by a vessel. Allowed values: 1 (Passable, requiring operation), 2 (Passable, no operation required), 3 (Not passable)
